TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ActivationContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ActivationContext Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class ActivationContext sealed : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type ActivationContext = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 識別目前應用程式的啟動內容。

span.span: Identifies the activation context for the current application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含並提供僅供內部使用的存取權的應用程式資訊清單。The class contains an and provides internal-only access to the application manifest. 在資訊清單架構啟動過程中會使用啟用內容，設定網域原則，並提供應用程式為基礎的安全性模型。The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and provide an application-based security model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件取得資訊清單為基礎的應用程式。The following code example demonstrates the use of an object to obtain the for a manifest-based application. 取得正確結果，請以資訊清單為基礎的應用程式執行這個程式碼範例。For correct results, execute this code example as a manifest-based application. [!code-csharp[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/vb/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前應用程式的 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: Gets the ClickOnce application manifest for the current application.

value.span: 位元組陣列，包含與這個 相關聯之應用程式的 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce application manifest for the application that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果啟用內容目前，這表示未安裝 應用程式在 ClickOnce 存放區中，部署資訊清單讀取暫存的下載資料夾。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果啟用內容目前，這表示應用程式安裝在 ClickOnce 存放區，部署資訊清單從讀取 ClickOnce 存放區。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 如需有關部署資訊清單的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ClickOnce 部署資訊清單](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: An object that identifies an application.

summary.span: 使用指定的應用程式識別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified application identity.

returns.span: 具有指定之應用程式識別的物件。

span.span: An object with the specified application identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫內部建構函式，建立新的啟用內容。The method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context. 實作類別在.NET Framework 2.0 版專為尚未完整安裝的存放區中且尚未完全包含在資料夾中的應用程式。The implementation of the class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder. 這個方法會提供公用建構函式用來提供完整的啟用內容的更新版本的回溯相容性。This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 在 中，未指定部署或應用程式識別。

span.span: No deployment or application identity is specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫內部建構函式，建立新的啟用內容。The method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context. 實作類別在.NET Framework 2.0 版專為尚未完整安裝的存放區中且尚未完全包含在資料夾中的應用程式。The implementation of the class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder. 這個方法會提供公用建構函式用來提供完整的啟用內容的更新版本的回溯相容性。This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果啟用內容目前，這表示未安裝 應用程式在 ClickOnce 存放區中，部署資訊清單讀取暫存的下載資料夾。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果啟用內容目前，這表示應用程式安裝在 ClickOnce 存放區，部署資訊清單從讀取 ClickOnce 存放區。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 如需有關部署資訊清單的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ClickOnce 部署資訊清單](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 可讓 物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業，不必等到記憶體回收利用 。

span.span: Enables an object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

summary.span: 取得目前應用程式的表單 (或存放區內容)。

span.span: Gets the form, or store context, for the current application.
One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資訊清單為基礎的應用程式可能未安裝在 ClickOnce 存放區中。A manifest-based application might not be installed in the ClickOnce store. 不在存放區，例如在 Visual Studio 中執行的資訊清單啟動的應用程式的應用程式分類為。An application that is not in the store, such as a manifest-activated application executing in Visual Studio, is classified as . 包含存放區中的應用程式分類為。An application that is contained in the store is classified as .
